nowhere2gopp.gamelogic.gameIO

Class GameIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • nowhere2gopp.gamelogic.gameIO.GameIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameOutput, Requestable

    public class GameIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameOutput, Requestable
    This class implements the In-/Output Window with clickable polygons for the corresponding game elements and a statusbar.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Marvin Sommer

      Internal class containing the JFrame, its elements and their behaviour

      Sets the viewer which delivers the gamedata and constructs a corresponding window.

      Shows status on the status label using the function provided by the inner class that extends JFrame.
      void toggleBGC()
      Toggles Backgroundcolor to the one of the opposite player(used for network play)
      void update(Move move, PlayerColor player)
      Updates the visual gameboard with a corresponding Move and the matching playercolor, is automatically called by request but can be manually called, when playing over the network or using AI-Players, to update the UI accordingly.
      void updateBGC()
      Updates the backgroundcolor to the corresponding player backgroundcolor

        public void update(Move move,
